articles.title: Derby set to pay Richard Keogh £2million after he won an appeal over his dismissal - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY MATT HUGHES: Richard Keogh has had an appeal upheld by a tribunal after he was sacked by Derby following his involvement in a drink-driving crash with his team-mates.
articles.content:
Derby face having to pay their sacked former captain Richard Keogh around £2million after he won an appeal at a tribunal over his dismissal following a car crash.
